translation.app_keyword: Job, candidate, Recruiter, Maritime industry jobs, Career, Seafarer
translation.landing_hero_subtitle: Profesea adalah platform lokerja khusus untuk industri maritim, logistik, dan pelaut, menyediakan lowongan kerja dan pelatihan terbaik.
translation.landing_about_subtitle: Profesea is Seafarer and Vessel match platform that provides featured and rapid candidate sourcing for Maritime Industry. Companies and employees have a chance to choose specific-technical options and detailed criterias via Profesea. Main goal is to help personnel & HR managers find suitable seafarers for their companies quickly and easily.
translation.landing_trainer_title: Get Your Seafarer Certificate from Our Premier Training
translation.landing_trainer_subtitle: Join our available training programs and open the door to becoming a successful seafarer!
translation.landing_job_title: Find a career and network in the maritime industry
translation.landing_job_subtitle: Connect with your dream companies, without the help of insiders
translation.landing_employer_description: Temukan kandidat terbaik untuk perusahaan maritim dan logistik Anda melalui platform pencarian Profesea.
translation.landing_findjob_description: Cari lowongan kerja terbaru di industri maritim dan logistik. Temukan peluang karier yang sesuai dengan keahlian Anda.
translation.landing_news_description: Dapatkan berita terbaru di industri maritim dan logistik hanya di Profesea News.
translation.landing_news_keyword: Berita maritim dan logistik, Berita terbaru
translation.landing_training_description: Ikuti sertifikasi pelaut dan pelatihan profesional untuk meningkatkan keterampilan dan karier Anda di industri maritim.
translation.register_seafarer_description: Daftar untuk lowongan pelaut on-ship terbaru dan mulailah karier Anda di lautan bersama Profesea.
translation.register_professional_description: Temukan lowongan pelaut off-ship terbaru. Daftar sekarang dan tingkatkan karier maritim Anda bersama Profesea.
translation.login_description: Login ke Profesea untuk mengakses profil, melamar pekerjaan, dan menemukan pelatihan sesuai kebutuhan Anda.
translation.landing_faq_description: Punya pertanyaan? Temukan jawaban dan informasi penting seputar platform Profesea di halaman FAQ kami.
translation.landing_term_description: Baca syarat dan ketentuan penggunaan Profesea untuk memahami aturan layanan kami.
translation.landing_privacy_description: Pelajari kebijakan privasi kami dan bagaimana Profesea menjaga keamanan data dan informasi pribadi Anda.
translation.register_description: Daftar di Profesea, Mulai Berkarier di Industri Maritim dan Logistik.
translation.b_to_seafarer_detail: Discover crewing opportunities in our platform.
translation.b_to_professional_detail: Explore thousands of unlimited job opportunities in maritime industry.
translation.b_to_recruiter_detail: Find high-quality candidates on our platform.
translation.b_to_trainer_detail: Join our platform to reach a wider audience.
translation.landing_pricing_title: Still not convinced? Start with a Star!
translation.landing_pricing_subtitle: You will get full access to with all the features.
translation.landing_jobs_subtitle: Find any jobs in the maritime industry that match your skills and interest
translation.landing_candidate_subtitle: Find the right candidate using our specific filters made for maritime industry jobs
translation.landing_discover_subtitle: Profesea is a professional and community platform to connects people with thousands of career opportunities in the maritime industry under our network. With the principle of understanding the maritime tight community, our objective is to provide solution for human resources problems in the maritime industry using our platform
translation.landing_discover_item_title_detail: Profesea solutions can support your business and career in the Maritime World
translation.landing_footer_title: Profesea that connects your career in the maritime and logistics industry with a trust wide community network
translation.landing_recruiter_title_1: As a source of most qualified talents for the maritime industry
translation.landing_recruiter_title_2: Recruitment platform with filter system as needed
translation.landing_trainer_subtitle_1: we make it easier for you to reach more audiences, and generate your business better
translation.landing_trainer_subtitle_2: with a professional maritime database that Profesea has, we can provide an effective alternative marketing channel and boost up your business
translation.landing_company_banner_hero: Discover Top Talent in Maritime and Logistics with Profesea
translation.landing_company_banner_description: Access a talent pool of world-class seafarers and professionals with diverse skills and experience in real-time through our digital maritime platform.
translation.landing_company_banner_bottom: Find candidates easily in the Profesea Talent Pool.
translation.landing_company_info_description_1: Discover and manage the best talent sources in real-time for your company's needs.
translation.landing_company_info_description_2: Directly post job vacancies for your company and instantly seen by the candidates in real-time.
translation.landing_company_info_description_3: Discuss current issues in the maritime and logistics industry.
translation.landing_company_info_description_4: Build networks and promote your company in career-focused environments.
translation.landing_company_step_description_1: Register and create a company account on profesea.id.
translation.landing_company_step_description_2: Create job postings and gain exposure on our platform.
translation.landing_company_step_description_3: Find the best candidates and gain access to the maritime and logistics community.
translation.landing_company_step_description_4: Manage candidate data for the next selection process.
translation.landing_company_faq_1_1: Profesea is an all-in-one platform for posting jobs from your company and expanding networking in the maritime and logistics industry.
translation.landing_company_faq_1_2: Additionally, you can join various community and alumni forums and connect directly with the best candidates.
translation.landing_company_faq_2_4: Verify the email you registered with.
translation.landing_company_faq_3: How to post a job on Profesea?
translation.landing_company_faq_3_2: Go to the Dashboard, then select Manage Job.
translation.landing_company_faq_3_3: Click Add New Job button in the top right corner.
translation.landing_company_faq_3_4: Complete all candidate qualification data required by your company.
translation.landing_company_faq_3_5: The more complete the data you add, the more accurately you can find the best candidates.
translation.landing_company_faq_4_1: No, Profesea is free. You are not charged any fees to post jobs on Profesea.
translation.landing_company_faq_5: Benefits of posting job vacancies on Profesea?
translation.landing_company_faq_5_1: Profesea has a wide network in the maritime and logistics industry. Your company can easily find the best candidates in our talent pool.
translation.landing_company_faq_6: Experiencing login/registration issues on the Profesea platform?
translation.landing_features_title_5: Social Media and Community Discussion Forum
translation.landing_features_subtitle_1: Fresh candidates with connections may find companies that suit their qualifications.
translation.landing_features_subtitle_2: Create, update, and upload your CV and Certificate realtime.
translation.landing_features_subtitle_3: Reminder for due date and next scheduled certification directly to your email.
translation.landing_features_subtitle_4: Display your availability status and get spotlight from the recruiters right away.
translation.landing_features_subtitle_5: Exchange ideas and expand your network with various professionals in the maritime industry.
translation.input_label_error_2: Password must be at least 8 characters
translation.input_label_error_3: Email must be a valid email
translation.input_label_error_4: The email or password is invalid. Please pay attention to the uppercase and lowercase letters in your email and password
translation.input_label_error_5: Please agree to the applicable Terms & Conditions and Privacy Policy
translation.input_label_error_6: Registrastion failed the password confirmation does not match
translation.login_modal_title_1: You're about to start this training
translation.login_modal_title_2: Temukan berbagai pekerjaan dan perluas networking kamu di industri maritim dan logistik
translation.login_modal_subtitle_1: Log in or Register to proceed with your training enrollment
translation.login_modal_subtitle_2_1: Bergabung di forum komunitas dan alumni
translation.login_modal_subtitle_2_2: Terhubung dengan perusahaan yang kamu inginkan
translation.register_text_10: Please fill in the information below
translation.register_text_15: E.g. Naval Architect, Technician, Finance, IT, Administration, etc.
translation.register_rule_3: Use a combination of numbers, letters, symbols, as well as uppercase and lowercase letters.

meetthecompanies.title: Meet the Companies
meetthecompanies.subtitle: Fresh candidates with connections may find companies that suit their qualifications.

cvbuilder.title: Real-time CV Builder
cvbuilder.subtitle: Create, update, and upload your CV and Certificate realtime.

careerassistance.title: Maritime Career Assistance
careerassistance.subtitle: Reminder for due date and next scheduled certification directly to your email.

beavailable.title: Be Available and Recruit Alert
beavailable.subtitle: Display your availability status and get spotlight from the recruiters right away.

input.password_tip: Minimal 8 karakter. Gunakan kombinasi angka, huruf, simbol, serta huruf besar dan kecil.

tos.tos_start: By signing up, you agree to the

dialog.title: Oops! It seems the email you entered is not registered.
dialog.description: Please check your email or register for a new account.

dialog.title: Oops! It seems the email you entered is already registered.
dialog.description: Please check your email or login to your account.

return_dialog.title: Cancel Registration Process?
return_dialog.description: If you cancel this process, you will need to re-enter all your account details from the beginning.

landing_page.title: Maritime & Logistics Ecosystem Solutions
landing_page.description: Discover limitless opportunities with our innovative all-in-one social media platform, connecting you to a vast network of maritime and logistics communities.

our_feature.title: Innovative Features to Grow Your Network and Potential
our_feature.feature_1: A space to share your insights, showcase your talents, and connect with companies and fellow professionals across the industry.
our_feature.feature_2: Explore career opportunities that align with your skills and aspirations.
our_feature.feature_3: Level up your skills with training programs from our trusted partners in the industry.

for_seafarer.title: Profesea for Seafarer
for_seafarer.description: Set sail on your career journey with our global maritime job platform. We help you find seafaring opportunities worldwide, ensuring compliance with international regulations—so you can explore new horizons and advance your career seamlessly across the globe.

for_professional.title: Profesea for Professional
for_professional.description: Build your dream team with our global hiring solution for the maritime and logistics industry. We help you easily recruit top professionals while ensuring compliance with local regulations—so you can expand your operations seamlessly across the globe.

for_recruiter.description: Use advanced filters and smart recommendations to streamline your hiring process.
for_recruiter.benefit_1: Post job online, no more paperwork.
for_recruiter.benefit_2: Use our quick filtering system for seafarer recruitment.
for_recruiter.benefit_4: Optimize talent acquisiton with Recuiter Star! Our subscription plan for companies.

for_trainer.description: Explore courses from officially recognized platforms and gain the certifications you need to excel. Want to grow with us? Become a trusted training partner today.
for_trainer.benefit_1: Online booking partner for maritime training center.
for_trainer.benefit_2: Alternative marketing channel that will amplify your training center's exposure.

our_benefit.title: Unlocking Opportunities with Profesea
our_benefit.benefit_title_1: Social media and community discussion forums
our_benefit.benefit_1: Exchange ideas and expand your network with various professionals in the maritime and logistics industry.
our_benefit.benefit_2: Reminder and scheduled certification directly to your email.
our_benefit.benefit_3: Make your availability known and get spotlight by recruiters immediately.
our_benefit.benefit_4: Create, update, and upload your CV and Certificate realtime.
our_benefit.benefit_5: Fresh candidates are able to connect with companies that suit their qualifications.

success_story.title: How they got onboard?
success_story.quotes_1: Profesea makes it easy for me and my colleagues to find the opportunities and connections we need in this industry.
success_story.quotes_2: Profesea helps us expand our candidate reach and provides efficient tools for faster and more effective recruitment.
success_story.quotes_3: The My Training feature on Profesea allows seafarers to access HUGOS training information and choose their preferred programs more easily.

employer_page.hero_1:
Hire the Best Maritime Talent.
Fast, Easy, No Hassle!
employer_page.hero_2:
With Profesea, you get instant access to a talent pool of skilled
seafarers and maritime professionals tailored to your needs.
employer_page.benefit_title: One Platform, One Maritime Solution.
employer_page.benefit_1_detail: Quick access to top-quality candidates without sorting through countless resumes.
employer_page.benefit_2_detail: Post job openings and connect with potential candidates within hours.
employer_page.benefit_3_detail: Engage with industry professionals and expand your recruitment network.
employer_page.benefit_4_detail: Strengthens your employer's branding and increases its visibility.
employer_page.join_title: Join in 3 Simple Steps
employer_page.join_1_detail: Register your company account, and our team will verify it quickly and efficiently.
employer_page.join_2_detail: Post a job and Profesea will help match you with the best talent.
employer_page.join_3_detail: Use Profesea’s features to manage the selection process and find the best candidates.
employer_page.find_title: Who’s Waiting for You on Profesea?
employer_page.footer_banner_detail:
Profesea connects you with a network of professionals ready to support operations
and drive innovation in the maritime and logistics industry.
employer_page.landing_company_faq_1_1:
Profesea is an all-in-one platform for posting jobs from your company and expanding networking in the maritime and logistics industry.
Additionally, you can join various community and alumni forums and connect directly with the best candidates.
employer_page.landing_company_faq_2_1:
1.Open Profesea.id
2.Register using your company email.
3.Complete your company profile.
4.Verify the email you registered with.
employer_page.landing_company_faq_3: How to post a job on Profesea?
employer_page.landing_company_faq_3_1:
1.Open Profesea.id
2.Go to the Dashboard, then select Manage Job.
3.Click Add New Job button in the top right corner.
4.Complete all candidate qualification data required by your company.
5.The more complete the data you add, the more accurately you can find the best candidates.
6.Once finished, click Submit.
employer_page.landing_company_faq_4_1: No, Profesea is free. You are not charged any fees to post jobs on Profesea.
employer_page.landing_company_faq_5: Benefits of posting job vacancies on Profesea?
employer_page.landing_company_faq_5_1: Profesea has a wide network in the maritime and logistics industry. Your company can easily find the best candidates in our talent pool.
employer_page.landing_company_faq_6: Experiencing login/registration issues on the Profesea platform?
employer_page.testimony_1: With Profesea, we can find quality candidates more easily. Crew information is now accessible quickly and accurately, making the process more efficient compared to the previous manual method.
employer_page.testimony_2: Profesea has been extremely helpful in finding the right candidates that match our company's needs.
employer_page.testimony_3: Profesea helps us expand our candidate reach and provides efficient tools for faster and more effective recruitment.

pricing.pricing_header_1:
Access All Recruitment Features
Free During Trial Period!
pricing.pricing_header_2: Start with the Basic plan, then upgrade to Plus – completely FREE during our open trial period! All premium features unlocked to help you recruit top talent in maritime and logistics

basic.description: Start simple with the option to grow anytime.

pricing.benefit_5: Get your jobs seen by more candidates
pricing.enterprise: For custom needs, dedicated support, SSO, and to opt out of data training
pricing.pricing_small_note: * This open trial has no end date yet. We'll inform you well in advance before any paid plans begin.
pricing.pricing_alert_title: Start Free. Unlock Everything with No Commitment
pricing.pricing_alert_description: No credit card. No strings attached. Just sign up and access all Plus features instantly.
pricing.pricing_alert_button: Sign Up & Try Plus Features Free

faq.question_1: What is the open trial period?
faq.answer_1: It's a phase where all companies can try the Plus plan for free and without a deadline.
faq.question_2: Do I need to provide payment details to upgrade?
faq.answer_2: Nope! Just click the upgrade button – no credit card needed.
faq.question_3: How long will the trial last?
faq.answer_3: There’s no end date for now. We’ll notify you in advance when changes happen.
faq.question_4: What happens when the trial ends?
faq.answer_4: We'll introduce paid options. You can choose to stay on Basic or move to a paid Plus plan.

training_landing_page.hero_description: Find the right courses to boost your skills and move forward in your maritime career all in one trusted place.
training_landing_page.hero_description_2: Have questions? Just ask. We’re here to navigate your career journey.
training_landing_page.section_join_us_description: Join our platform to grow your presence in the maritime industry. Promote your training programs and engage with a wider network of professionals.
training_landing_page.contact_dialog_description: We’re here to help you find the right solution and pricing that truly fits your business.
training_landing_page.contact_dialog_description_right: Our help center’s full of useful info and ready when you need it. Can’t find what you’re looking for? Just give us a shout. We’re happy to help!

default_error_page.title: We're Docking for a Quick Fix
default_error_page.description_1: Our crew is working hard to keep Profesea sailing smoothly. We'll be back shortly!
default_error_page.description_2: Need urgent help? Contact our support crew at

onboarding.welcome_content: You haven't joined any groups yet — but that's about to change! Join groups to stay updated, share insights, and connect with fellow maritime professionals.
onboarding.join_groups_content: Scroll through recommended groups and topics. Click “Join group” to become a member and dive into discussions right away.
onboarding.create_group_content: Start a group for your team, training cohort, or niche interest. Just click + Create new group and set your own topic and rules.
onboarding.access_joined_group_content: Everything you join or manage shows up right here. Use this sidebar to quickly switch between groups and stay organized.
